title: User Interface Software Engineer
responsibilities: Architect and develop reusable React components used across Microsoft 365 applications
Lead frontend architecture decisions improving performance by 40% using advanced TypeScript patterns
Design and implement comprehensive component library adhering to accessibility standards and i18n requirements
Drive frontend testing strategy achieving 90% test coverage through unit and integration tests
Build innovative UI prototypes for emerging AI technologies, rapidly iterating based on user feedback
Implement cross-browser compatible features serving millions of global users
Optimize build processes reducing deployment time by 35% using modern tooling (Webpack, npm)
Collaborate with designers to create delightful user experiences through interactive prototypes
Establish frontend development standards focusing on SEO, performance, and accessibility
Lead A/B testing implementations to validate new features at scale
Mentor team members on frontend architecture best practices and component design patterns
Drive adoption of modern CSS architecture patterns across multiple products
technologies: React, TypeScript, Webpack, Jest, CSS-in-JS, Modern CSS, A/B Testing Frameworks
